Updates the style

Tells if the control catches mouse events
A control catches mouse events when it is visible, enabled and when it explicitly catches it (enables by default, except for static controls. Setting both background and foreground invisible will also prevent mouse events catching.
false if the mouse events don't affect the control.

sets the visibility
